title: Rule 15 But Not An Event

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- <#977547294293504060> does not exist.
- All evil factions are functionally Mafia.
- All good factions are functionally Town.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player and a faction each night. They become functionally that faction (for example, if you made them Everfrost, they'd be able to use the factiona roleblock, but they'd still win with their original faction).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have every non-Neutral player be a different faction from each other in one way or another by the end of the game.
